Title: Relates to owner's policy of liability insurance
Summary: Relates to an owner's policy of liability insurance; increases the limits for liability arising out of bodily injury to or death of any person.
LawCode: Amd ยง311, V & T L; amd ยง5210, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law and the insurance law, in relation to owner's policy of liability insurance
